website_summaries.verdict: A long-lasting toy for destructive chewers within its weight range in a fun dinosaur shape you won’t mind kicking around the house.
pros: Three versions available: Stegosaurus, T-Rex, or Brontosaurus
Lined with nubs to help clear tartar from teeth and massage gums
cons: Made for dogs up to 25 pounds

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 Dino!
customer_reviews.text: I now realize the seller is trying to convey that there Are three different dinosaur designs, and you are not guaranteed to get one versus another. But unfortunately, by showing a picture of III as the lead image, you can easily believe, as I did, that you were ordering three dinosaurs, not one. For that reason I am giving 2 stars as it is misleading for value/cost. Not giving 1 star as no where does it say 3 dinosaurs, but the description could be clearer of what you are getting. I feel duped.
customer_reviews.author: nc stater

customer_reviews.title: Product not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Received a totally different dinosaur chew toy than the one pictured and came in a brown envelope instead of the Nylabone packaging. This was a gift for a friend with a new puppy but I threw it away instead since I suspect it may be a fake and potentially dangerous to the dog. Not worth the effort to return.
customer_reviews.author: LMC

customer_reviews.title: Dogs favorite toy and it was only a buck!
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this, I thought it would be a choking hazard and too small for my 30lb dog. However I was blown away with how much he loved this! He holds it between his saw and chews it all day. Just watch your feet, its worse than Legos if you step on it.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Karpinski

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately not safe for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give a better review as my dog really loves Nylabone. She is a 15 lbs terrier mix, a strong chewer but a small dog nonetheless. This toy lasted not even two days, maybe less than 1 hour of chewing time overall. Once my dog chews on it the material forms into spikes hurting my dog’s gums. As you can see in the picture, her gums start bleeding... sad as she really loves these, but it’s not safe.
customer_reviews.author: CaliCali

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Great chew.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this until the have their adult teeth, but this is great!! My dog won’t go to sleep without it in his crate... this is destructible so watch out for wear and tear, but my dog loves it!
customer_reviews.author: MadilynnS

customer_reviews.title: Raised 25 Dobie Pups Kong has made the Grade!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite 3 -4 month old 20-36 lb Doberman puppy has loved many Kong toys none of which have broken or caused her mouth to bleed she’s wait 20-30.4 lbs in this time frame & is still teething on all of them. A couple are a little big at first but she loves them & chews at them. Perfect Kong has improved & I have raised 25 dogs. Kong is expensive but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: VanillaPepper

customer_reviews.title: We don't know why they love this, but they do!
customer_reviews.text: It seems incredibly boring compared to all the cute, colorful toys, and gets pokey (painful when you roll over on it in bed if they carried it in with them in the morning!), but our 2 young Chihuahuas love it! It's durable and a favorite, can't ask for more than that. One of them even likes playing fetch with it.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Great for aggressive chewers
customer_reviews.text: Yum yum yum our pup loves his Dino. For some reason red really gets him going and he loves all of the books and crannies this toy has. He’s a pretty extremely chewer and this has lasted a lot longer than I thought it would. We are going to buy another one for him since he chews on it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Jean

customer_reviews.title: Dynamite Dino!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and they can’t get enough of them! Best value I’ve found on this reputable brand in a really long time. So far my foster, a super chewer, has enjoyed the dino without ruining it - that’s definitely a good sign of its durability!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Schichtel

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: My small dog is a chewer, Like a monster (she is 24 lbs). Bought them for her. My large dog (90 lbs) is not as much but started chewing as soon as I gave it to her. Dino head will be destroyed by morning. Rather it than my couches. 😆
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as white dinos
customer_reviews.text: This disappointed me. I buy the white dinnos on bulk cause they are one of the few toys it takes my 3 huskys time to tear up. So I bought this for their stockings it was red for the holidays and cute. I figured it would hold up like the others andvjust be red. It took my dogs an hour to tear it up.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great bone great value
customer_reviews.text: Nylabone is a great company and their products, for the most part, are always awesome. These bones are no exception to that. Our baby loves them! They are so cheap we pass them out as gifts when out friends get puppies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 7 Years, 5 Dinosaurs and 3 Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Our Frenchie's favorite dental chew for 7 years which she relunctantly shares with her 2 dog-sisters. Of all the dental dog chews we have purchased over the past 25 years these are easily our dogs' favorite.
customer_reviews.author: MatitoTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Chewed sharp points
customer_reviews.text: My small dog must have really sharp teeth and strong jaws. He chewed this in such a way that it left very sharp points that dug into his gums and was painful to pick the item up.
customer_reviews.author: SueVDB

customer_reviews.title: dino nylabone
customer_reviews.text: This bone just came today, and my papillon grabbed it right away. He is a voracious little chewer, and he chewed on it for quite a while. I have bought many nylabones, and they have always lasted several months before they get to where he can bite off little pieces. This one is small enough for his little mouth, and I love how it is textured.
customer_reviews.author: chilady

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and good for dental hygiene
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dogs because their dog friend has them and absolutely loves them. Come to find out, my guys just buried them and never pursued them again!! Who knew? I still think they're a great idea!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: dog loves it and good for her teeth
customer_reviews.text: My dog actually takes this cute little dinosaur to bed with her - something to gnaw on when she wakes or is restless while she's teething. So many other similar items were rejected - but she just loves the dinos.
customer_reviews.author: cie

customer_reviews.title: Chew-Rex
customer_reviews.text: I have a 50 lbs dog that’s an active chewer, one of these usually last her 3 weeks before the head and tail are good, but she will continue to chew on the torso for a several weeks off and on after that. So I get her one ever few months.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Durable, light weight, awesome product! A
customer_reviews.text: These are the best for my little Emma!! She loves to chew and this is her favorite!! I like that there are no little plastic pieces all over the floor, like other chew toys. It's durable, but also light weight enough to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: ddaisie00

customer_reviews.title: A must have item for dogs who love to chew
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love the Nylabone dental dinosaurs. They are made well and will provide your dog with hours and hours of enjoyment. They last a long time and we will continue to order them for our dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Donna R. Walters

customer_reviews.title: my dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered a couple of these, and my dogs love them. They are pokey and feel good on my teething puppy's teeth. Also they smell like dog treats so my dogs went crazy when I opened them.
customer_reviews.author: Alysha

customer_reviews.title: Aggressive Chewers
customer_reviews.text: I buy these in the regular size for my huskys. So when we had a litter I bought 5 one for each pup to take home. You really can't beat the price and they last longer than most toys with my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Jones

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is a power chewer and this does hold up well to him. However, he doesn't care for this product. Not sure if it's the flavor, the color, or the shape. We try to change things up for him as he loves the wishbone in this brand but this particular product is one that he loses interest in rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: jsky

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my dog occupied
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my small Jack Russell chihuahua. He destroys everything. He does like to chew it and it keeps him occupied, but it is too heavy for him to lift. Just be prepared to carry it for smaller dogs. Other than that, great product.
customer_reviews.author: MCoyne

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it but smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I got this toy because my dogs are power-chewers and will basically tear through anything that isn't quadruple reinforced iron. This toy promised to hold up against big chompers and it did for a good amount of time. The only problem is that the toy is actually pretty small. Once my pups chewed it down a bit, I had to take it away because it was 100% a choking hazard. Great toy, just wish it was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Logan E.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 27 pound mutt loves this thing. Lasts about 8 months with dang near daily chewing on it. On my second one and will keep buying as long as they make them. Do recommend throwing out once it gets small enough to fit into your pets mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Maher

customer_reviews.title: ONLY ONE DINOSAUR IN PACKAGE
customer_reviews.text: Like another reviewer, did not realize there is only ONE dino. I thought there were three miscellaneous ones in the package. After all, I can order FIVE for $29, why the heck does it cost $16 for ONE?
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Wood

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I finally found something my puppy hasn't chewed through. Although he may be getting bored with it, it was a great purchase. Warning: HURTS LIKE CRAZY TO STEP ON, haha... no really!
customer_reviews.author: Jami Kobold

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite- durable!
customer_reviews.text: Our 75 lb dog is a powerful chewer and loves these. After a few weeks she wears away the nubbins and the head of the dinosaur so we replace it. But that is vigorous chewing for hours a day so 4-5 weeks is a long time to last in our house
customer_reviews.author: Nala27

customer_reviews.title: My yorkies fav - but pieces so come off quick
customer_reviews.text: Something about the shape of this makes it super interesting for my yorkie to chew on. He does break off pieces so I have to watch it and replace after about a week. I’d give it more starts if it didn’t wear down so fast. The head can become like a detached separate piece over time chewing.
customer_reviews.author: Ilovemydogs

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this chew-toy
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this toy so much one of her favorites! only thing i personally dislike is if she leaves in middle of floor it hurts worse than a lego to step on. Yet she loves so i would buy again once she chews it up more... had it for 6 mo. so far and still seems to have a while to go
customer_reviews.author: Rosalena Godoy

customer_reviews.title: My dog wants to chew this
customer_reviews.text: I hate spending money on toys that my puppy eirher rejects right away or distroys in the 1st hour. This is excellent, and bought another for rides in the car after she ate my umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Diehl

customer_reviews.title: Great product , but killer on the feet
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs. One golden pup - 4 months old and 2 yorkies -3 years old they allll love this toy ! Be careful where you step- it’s worse the stepping on a Lego! Lol
customer_reviews.author: April Furey

customer_reviews.title: Second Time Purchasing
customer_reviews.text: This was my second time purchasing this dinosaur chew. My dogs loved the first one, but we decided to replace it since it was well loved. The toy is super hard, and I did not think it would be appealing to my dogs, but they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kaity

customer_reviews.title: Buying more soon
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my puppy for her first birthday at the beginning of January and it’s still her favorite toy! She has chewed the head pretty good so it’s great for teething. One flaw would be that it’s very loud when the dog drops it or it falls off the couch so we put it away at bed time. Other than that this is the best most durable toy we’ve found for her so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for teething puppies
customer_reviews.text: The texture on this toy varies on different parts of the dinosaur, which keeps my pup busy while he moves around on its various smoother, rougher, and knobbier parts. Really helps with his urge to chew while teething.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Riley

customer_reviews.title: MY PUPPY'S FAVORITE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have soooooo many toys and chew items for my little mini schnauzer. I must say, he chose this as his favorite from day one and now at almost a year old still find him chewing Mr. Dinosaur!!!
customer_reviews.author: maitai

customer_reviews.title: Nice bone for small begin chewer dogs
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last as long as the nulabones. Dogs chewed the tail part to it came off not very safe. But my dogs are chewers. Pugs. Wouldn’t buy again this size. The larger one was a lot better
customer_reviews.author: Items

customer_reviews.title: Favorite chew toy
customer_reviews.text: My puppy’s favorite toy! Mojo the Aussiedor puppy loves this little Dino. It’s super cute and the small fits his mouth perfect for his 8 week to 3 months Age so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: my dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: I buy these whenever I can find them at a decent price because my dogs adore them. Nylabones will always be my go to for my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: BeckyMChat

customer_reviews.title: Good toy, small
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t believe how cheap this was. My dogs are very rough chewers and destroy toys easily. They love this toy so much. It feels like hard plastic. The only thing I didn’t enjoy was the size. It is definitely a small toy. It’s fine just small.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: If your dog chews through everything,  you need this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a heavy chewer, and he loves this thing. He can chew through a natural bone in a day... so for something to last us this long is unheard of. It's his favorite! Just bought another in the event this one gets lost!
customer_reviews.author: melody schwartzman

customer_reviews.title: Great for chew time!
customer_reviews.text: This particular one is great for little ones. My larger dogs have their own, but this one is perfect for our chi-whinnie!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Long ladting
customer_reviews.text: Our doggie loves this. She is a pit about 45lbs . Got it for Christmas and still has it. It's her go to chew
customer_reviews.author: Lalee

customer_reviews.title: Good for chewers!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is obsessed with this. It’s a perfect size and texture (hard plastic) for a pug who loves to chew chew chew. The Dino no longer has its head.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: We have had a few of these bones before. My dog LOVES them. She chews them down and then we buy her a new one. This red one will be perfect for her stocking on christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Loves these chew toys. Keeps puppy busy. Lasts awhile. Great for active chewers.
customer_reviews.author: Smc0120

customer_reviews.title: these are the really little ones
customer_reviews.text: Nylabone doesn't do a good job of labelling their products re: size, be aware this is the tiny dino. Pkg says up to 25 lbs. This is smaller than the one we were after.
customer_reviews.author: WWWWoodchuck

customer_reviews.title: Check the floor before you go pee
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave this 3 stars is because I woke up in middle of the night to go to the bathroom, didn’t see it on the ground, stepped on it, went airborne like you see in the cartoons when somebody steps on banana peel, and busted my lip. My Dog loves it though.
customer_reviews.author: Megan cleary

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My mini doxie loves this dinosaur bone and prefers it to the other bones I have given him.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Favorite of my pup
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it! He got it for Christmas and LOVES IT! He even tried to take it outside with him! He loves the head the most. Is apparently beef flavored!
customer_reviews.author: timothy bayruns

customer_reviews.title: GirlyBrown loves these.
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered these several times. My Min-Pin loves them. Really gives them a workout.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great for teething
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves this. Chews for 30 minutes at a time. No teeth marks! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Plauger

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love this
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this. I should’ve bought more! It’s super durable too, still in one piece
customer_reviews.author: Dara Gallipoli

customer_reviews.title: My pup ignores it despite liking other chew toys
customer_reviews.text: Just did not work with my little dog who prefers other chew toys for whatever reasons. It is durable and I'm sure it works well for some dogs other than mine.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: My dog had the original version of this product. She chewed on it for more than six months and hardly made a dent in it. I only got rid of it because she made one end too jagged and it was snagging everything. This one didn’t last one hour out of the package. She immediately was able to chew chunks off. It is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG the best! Four dogs who fight over them and chew for hours daily. Had them for a year and only heads are gone :)
customer_reviews.author: PMS

customer_reviews.title: Chewer’s Delight
customer_reviews.text: Loved by dogs who enjoy a good, long chew. Bonus for dog owners as it helps stave off plaque buildup.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte S

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Spikes
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a durable toy, but the plastic "spikes" on the dino are sharp. Get stuck on my rugs. Toy seems durable - very hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: aggie04

customer_reviews.title: Akin to stepping on Legos after the dog has been chewing on it
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for our older dog. Right now it’s lost, but she loves gnawing on it when she can find it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A. Gable

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the size change
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happened but this thing is way smaller than the ones I bought last year. Based on how our Frenchie destroys them, I guess it will be trash twice as fast, too.
customer_reviews.author: Soonerchick78

customer_reviews.title: Batman approves!!
customer_reviews.text: Every bone I have ever bought him he has shredded in under 10 minutes. He chewed on this bone for a couple of hours and it's still holding strong! Would definitely recommend if you have an aggressive chewer! 🙌
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: I have bought these for years from Amazon, however ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these for years from Amazon, however this time they made them half the size that they have also been. Really made me made. No more Nylabone for my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Joan M

customer_reviews.title: Great for small and picky dogs
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves it and we feel better knowing it is good for his teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Bugalydosh

customer_reviews.title: Hold up well
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved it and it lasted longer than similar items I have purchased in the past.
customer_reviews.author: alabamagirl

customer_reviews.title: Dogs seem to like it.
customer_reviews.text: Good distraction for my puppy to avoid chewing on the sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Skittles

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand, but this particular toy was destroyed in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Veronicxtx

customer_reviews.title: cheaper online than in stores
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves the nylabone dura chews and they’re some of the only ones that can stand up to his chewing. Great price for a large nylabone and honestly way cheaper than in pet stores
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Robinson

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this.
customer_reviews.text: This is her favorite chew toy. She goes for it every time! She's a medium chewer and I expect this to last for at least a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: he really seems to like them. It's very durable and last quite a ...
customer_reviews.text: 3rd one ordered for dog, he really seems to like them. It's very durable and last quite a while, however, once chewed down, can get some sharper edges at times depending how chewed
customer_reviews.author: PhillyPhan

customer_reviews.title: Not for chewers
customer_reviews.text: NOT for avid chewers! My puppy is 8 months old and it didn’t last 5 minutes before she chewed the head off and I had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ring

customer_reviews.title: Pup loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend's puppy loves this. She took to it immediately, and it's her favorite chew toy, so far!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Atencio

customer_reviews.title: good but my pup doesn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: my puppy doesn’t seem to be a fan of this toy.
customer_reviews.author: alexisgoodman

customer_reviews.title: Not for pully /sml dogs
customer_reviews.text: super heavy and hard. Like a big brick. . Dangerous for a puppy imo
customer_reviews.author: Ninjabetic

customer_reviews.title: Grip challenges
customer_reviews.text: The angles of the dinosaur bone make establishing a solid grip while upright challenging. Because the bone is slick, he isn’t able to chew for more than a few seconds before it slides from his grasp. After multiple attempts to keep it steady, he usually gives up and moves onto something else. Willing to give it a few weeks to see if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Odd shape for our dog
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy chew toy! Not his favorite toy, but our doggo does enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Booklover91

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: This was a bit smaller than I anticipated and was a harder plastic than the larger ones - it works for my chihuahua, but not for my border collies. An ok product for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenee

customer_reviews.title: Nylabone
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves this & it lasts a long time. Bought this for a toy poodle
customer_reviews.author: JSun

customer_reviews.title: Great for aggressive chewers.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these toys. They chew them up until they stick to the carpet!
customer_reviews.author: TRoss

customer_reviews.title: Great product!! Value for your money.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a puppy who is looking to chew on anything she can get her mouth on!
customer_reviews.author: Terri B

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is not for agressive chewers to small of areas to break off not recommended for heavy chewers like the reviews lasted 5 mins
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Loved them
customer_reviews.text: Last very long. Morkie lives these. Keeps him busy for hours.
customer_reviews.author: CJERS

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: My three English Setters love this chew toy. They each take turns chewing it.
customer_reviews.author: oldnewyorker

customer_reviews.title: He loved the bacon flavor but it was getting too sharp ...
customer_reviews.text: Kept him busy for about 30 minutes until he knawed the end into pieces. He loved the bacon flavor but it was getting too sharp to let him chew on. Not for extreme chewers.
customer_reviews.author: SONNY

customer_reviews.title: Durable for strong chewers!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs devour everything. This toy has lasted a week already! Wooohooo!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Aggressive chewer's favorite
customer_reviews.text: One of the longer lasting chew toys for my puppy. She loves these! They last about a month (long for us) and then we get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Maketa

customer_reviews.title: Great for strong chewers
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with the nylabone dinosaur. We’ve had two in the past that the dogs have enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog isn't a big chewer, but she does enjoy chewing on this fairly frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Libertini

customer_reviews.title: Good for small dog
customer_reviews.text: This is for a small dog. I thought it might be tough enough for 22 lb dog but took it away within minutes. Purchased larger Dino that is more suitable for Tibetan Terrier who is a good chewer
customer_reviews.author: KATHLEEN RADLOFF

customer_reviews.title: A favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the favorite toys in our home!!
customer_reviews.author: mairin

customer_reviews.title: Puppy likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a friends new puppy. It’s his favorite chew toy (he seems to like the flavor) and has held up well so far in the first couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Doris B.

customer_reviews.title: VERY DURABLE
customer_reviews.text: Our dog DESTROYS EVERY toy we buy him. This is the ONLY toy that’s a challenge for him and he hasn’t destroyed. It keeps him busy.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Scott

customer_reviews.title: You’ll only get 1 dinosaur
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this bone. However, I was under the impression that I was ordering three of these, not just one. I was disappointed when only one product arrived. Additionally, we were unable to then choose which dinosaur we received
customer_reviews.author: George Prieto

customer_reviews.title: Not safe.
customer_reviews.text: Not great at all. Dangerous, in fact. I purchased this because I thought it was good for heavy chewers. First of all, it was much smaller than I anticipated. Second of all, within minutes of my dog chewing, pieces of it we’re shearing off and huge teeth marks were present on it. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Zazoo12

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this!!! Durable and has lasted a long time and still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J.

customer_reviews.title: Very hard plastic
customer_reviews.text: This is made of very hard plastic with no give at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: Great dental toy for a 11 month old Goldendoodle. This is about the 4th one he has had. He is quite a chewing machine and he loves this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Snowman867

customer_reviews.title: Great dog toy!
customer_reviews.text: Doggo and pupper love to chew on this and fight over it daily!
customer_reviews.author: MorkieMadness

customer_reviews.title: Best nylabone
customer_reviews.text: My mini Aussie LOVES this nylabone. It is a great size for him and he loves all the small points on the dino to chomp on.
customer_reviews.author: katherine denison

customer_reviews.title: Question on Material used
customer_reviews.text: Was afraid to give them to my dog. Material hard, was afraid they would break a tooth
customer_reviews.author: Lynn  Allen

product_meta.title: Nylabone Dental Dinosaur Chew Toy
product_meta.description: Size:Small/Regular - Up to 25 lbs.| Style:Chicken FlavorPowerful chewers need powerful chew toys! Our Power Chew Dura Chew Dental Dinosaur satisfies your dog’s prehistoric urge to chew with irresistible chicken flavor. This dental chew toy is designed to reduce the incidence of periodontal disease in dogs by massaging gums and scraping teeth to remove food particles. The result is a healthier mouth and fresher breath. Plus, the gently rounded nubs and bristles raised during chewing promote clean teeth and help control plaque and tartar.
